name: pizza-vamsi-unified
description: Unified pizza delivery platform with main website and admin dashboard

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.install:apps: cd project && npm install --production=false && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm install --production=false && cd ../project/server && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin && npm run build:server && npm run build:copy
